name: PastorTonyClarkSermons
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pastor tony clark sermons
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to The Word Made Plain with Pastor Tony Clark of Calvary Chapel Newport News, Teaching verse by verse, chapter by chapter and book by book.

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Pastor Tony Clark Sermons"

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Pastor Tony Clark Sermons for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Pastor Tony Clark Sermons for the date of this episode."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
